title: Frankie Essex showcases her one stone weight loss in a skimpy white bikini while holidaying in Bali
text:
She has shed one and a half stone after overhauling her lifestyle earlier this year.

And Frankie Essex looked the picture of confidence as she slipped into a skimpy white crochet bikini during her Bali holiday earlier this week.

The former reality star, 31, put on a very busty display as she showcased her jaw-dropping cleavage and taut midriff in the subtly patterned halterneck top.

Gorgeous: Frankie Essex, 31, looked the picture of confidence as she slipped into a skimpy white crochet bikini during her Bali holiday earlier this week

The platinum beauty styled her long hair extensions into appropriately beachy waves and sported a heavy make-up application.

Frankie covered up with a silky turquoise cover-up as she took a break from the sunshine on a cabana bed.

The former TOWIE star took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a snap of herself in the bikini, and complemented her look with a sheer polka dot sarong, mirrored aviators and a red headband.

She captioned the sizzling snap: 'Count your blessings'. Her cousin Chloe Sims commented 'Wow', while Love Island's Cara Kilbey gushed: 'You look beautiful'.

Taking a break: Frankie covered up with a silky turquoise cover-up as she took a break from the sunshine on a cabana bed

Sizzling display: Frankie took to Instagram to share a snap of herself in the bikini, finishing off her beachy look with a sheer polka dot sarong, mirrored aviators and a red headband

Frankie is currently holidaying around Bali and has been keeping her followers updated on her travels.

Frankie has shed the pounds through strength training, a healthy diet and only consuming alcohol twice this year.

Speaking to Closer Magazine about her fitness, she said: 'My arms and my legs have toned up and I feel stronger. I've got a flatter tummy and a smaller waist without doing any stomach exercises. It's even tightened the loose skin on my belly.'

The beauty, who has also dropped two dress sizes and is a slender size 8-10, added: 'l'll never be a slim girl, and I don't want to be skinny, I've got a bum! Accepting my curves has been good for me.'

Ample cleavage: The former reality star put on a very busty display as she showcased her jaw-dropping cleavage and taut midriff in the subtly patterned halterneck top

The sister of Joey Essex also revealed that she has a new boyfriend, as she explained: 'Yes, I'm in a relationship. We've been seeing each other for a few months, and I'm really happy. He treats me well and is very, very, supportive in every way, we're good together.'

Frankie's new lifestyle follows her two stone weight gain which was a result of her not being able to work out due to an injury.

A friend of hers told The Sun: 'Frankie had a terrible year of not being able to exercise due to a knee injury.

'She still can't exercise and is the biggest she has ever been. She's put on 2 stone. It's really getting her down but she has the all clear now and is determined to get back into great shape in 2019.'

The blonde bombshell previously revealed what her secret was to shedding the weight in the first place and admitted that she found it difficult to give up ketchup among other sauces to reach her goal weight.
